name: People & Ideas
goal: People&Ideas is a European consultancy based in Brussels and active in 7 European countries. It brings ideas and Policy together in EU Policy advocacy, association support, heritage networks, historical tourism, event organisation, copywriting, writing and photography.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Horizon Europe, Structural Funds, Culture Programme, Creative Europe, Enterprise / Tourism
